channel.title: Seeking Interested Client Developer
channel.description:
Ascaria is currently seeking [B]1[/B] interested client developer. If you have all of the requirements found below, please comment or add "[B]jon.niemiec[/B]" via Skype:
[ul][*]Prior experience [*]Large understanding of Java [*]Understanding of cache editing [*]Understanding of 317 clients [*]Creativity is greatly appreciated (highly recommended) [*]Mature[/ul]
This is currently [B]not[/B] a paid job, however, as we get closer to a release date, payment and benefits will be talked about then.
To learn more about Ascaria and its background, you can view our project thread which can be found in the spoiler below.
We hope to hear from you soon.
[spoiler][B][U][SIZE=4]S E R V E R - I N F O R M A T I O N[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[CODE]Revision: 317 Source: RuneSource[/CODE]
[B][U][SIZE=4]B A C K G R O U N D[/SIZE][/U][/B]
It was an idea to start a new, unique, never-before-seen RuneScape Private Server for months between two great friends. With months of talking about it, the motivation wasn't quite enough. But finally, we noticed that RuneScape Private Servers are just dying and repeating. In late November 2014, the name Ascaria was set in stone. Mod Jon, Owner, and Mod Four, Co-Owner, are the ones responsible for the birth of Ascaria.
[B][U][SIZE=4]A B O U T - U S [/SIZE][/U][/B]
Ascaria is an "in the making" RuneScape Private Server. Our developers are working really hard to get unique features into Ascaria. The following are some features that will be found in Ascaria:
[ul][*]Custom Skilling Area [*]100+ Achievements [*]Custom Quests [*]Choose Experience Rate: x5, x10, x20, or x30 [*]FunPK Area [*]Custom Trade Center [*]Working Minigames [*]2 Custom Minigames [*]All Working Skills[/ul]
Find out even more features by playing Ascaria when it's released!
[B][U][SIZE=4]T H E - A S C A R I A - T E A M[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[I]Owner:[/I] Jon [I]Co-Owner:[/I] Four [I]Head of Development:[/I] JKetelaar [I]Lead Content Developer:[/I] Austin [I]Forum Administrator:[/I] Baylo *We are currently not looking for any more members to join the Ascaria Team at this time*
[B][U][SIZE=4]M E D I A[/SIZE][/U][/B] [SPOIL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TL0qY6E.png[/img] Entrana: the place where you'll start your adventure!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FNx7ekY.png[/img] Choose what experience rate you'd like!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/of7Dn6K.png[/img] Complete over 100 achievements and gain rewards such as armour and money!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F6Qz9uY.jpg[/img] Play our custom minigame: Invasion! Complete 50 waves of fun by killing zombies. Bosses appear every 10 levels!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4NP3m3x.png[/img] Custom Quests are currently in the making!
More photos will be added as development progresses.[/SPOIL]
[B][U][SIZE=4]R E C E N T - U P D A T E S[/SIZE][/U][/B]
Recent Updates include everything between a one week frame.
[CODE]Ascaria Ranged Shop added to home Ascaria Defensive Shop added to home Ascaria Melee Shop added to home Ascaria Magic Shop added to home Ascaria Skilling Supply Shop added to home Donor Store on website updated Item Aggression fixes Skilling Area worked on Renaming of teleports to match corresponding area New minigame in the making Regular Donor area created VIP Donor area created Trading Area Adjustments HitDef on weapons New teleportation system Added new auto restarter to server New dialogue system More added to the Skilling Area NPC additions and fixes New minigame 40% completed[/CODE][/CENTER][/spoiler]

item.title: Seeking Interested Client Developer
item.dc:creator: @Ascaria Ascaria
item.description:
@Ascaria wrote:

Ascaria is currently seeking [B]1[/B] interested client developer. If you have all of the requirements found below, please comment or add “[B]jon.niemiec[/B]” via Skype:

[ul][]Prior experience
[]Large understanding of Java
[]Understanding of cache editing
[]Understanding of 317 clients
[]Creativity is greatly appreciated (highly recommended)
[]Mature[/ul]

This is currently [B]not[/B] a paid job, however, as we get closer to a release date, payment and benefits will be talked about then.

To learn more about Ascaria and its background, you can view our project thread which can be found in the spoiler below.

We hope to hear from you soon.

[spoiler][B][U][SIZE=4]S E R V E R - I N F O R M A T I O N[/SIZE][/U][/B]

Revision: 317 Source: RuneSource

[B][U][SIZE=4]B A C K G R O U N D[/SIZE][/U][/B]

It was an idea to start a new, unique, never-before-seen RuneScape Private Server for months between two great friends. With months of talking about it, the motivation wasn’t quite enough. But finally, we noticed that RuneScape Private Servers are just dying and repeating. In late November 2014, the name Ascaria was set in stone. Mod Jon, Owner, and Mod Four, Co-Owner, are the ones responsible for the birth of Ascaria.

[B][U][SIZE=4]A B O U T - U S [/SIZE][/U][/B]

Ascaria is an “in the making” RuneScape Private Server. Our developers are working really hard to get unique features into Ascaria. The following are some features that will be found in Ascaria:

[ul][]Custom Skilling Area
[]100+ Achievements
[]Custom Quests
[]Choose Experience Rate: x5, x10, x20, or x30
[]FunPK Area
[]Custom Trade Center
[]Working Minigames
[]2 Custom Minigames
[*]All Working Skills[/ul]

Find out even more features by playing Ascaria when it’s released!

[B][U][SIZE=4]T H E - A S C A R I A - T E A M[/SIZE][/U][/B]

[I]Owner:[/I] Jon
[I]Co-Owner:[/I] Four
[I]Head of Development:[/I] JKetelaar
[I]Lead Content Developer:[/I] Austin
[I]Forum Administrator:[/I] Baylo
We are currently not looking for any more members to join the Ascaria Team at this time

[B][U][SIZE=4]M E D I A[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[SPOIL]

Entrana: the place where you’ll start your adventure!


Choose what experience rate you’d like!


Complete over 100 achievements and gain rewards such as armour and money!


Play our custom minigame: Invasion! Complete 50 waves of fun by killing zombies. Bosses appear every 10 levels!


Custom Quests are currently in the making!

More photos will be added as development progresses.[/SPOIL]

[B][U][SIZE=4]R E C E N T - U P D A T E S[/SIZE][/U][/B]

Recent Updates include everything between a one week frame.

Ascaria Ranged Shop added to home Ascaria Defensive Shop added to home Ascaria Melee Shop added to home Ascaria Magic Shop added to home Ascaria Skilling Supply Shop added to home Donor Store on website updated Item Aggression fixes Skilling Area worked on Renaming of teleports to match corresponding area New minigame in the making Regular Donor area created VIP Donor area created Trading Area Adjustments HitDef on weapons New teleportation system Added new auto restarter to server New dialogue system More added to the Skilling Area NPC additions and fixes New minigame 40% completed[/CENTER][/spoiler]
